forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 22C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 72F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
